content1.title: What does our Crane Inspection do ?

subtitle.text: Crane inspection is a detailed visual and operational inspection whereby individual components of the crane and lifting gear are examined to determine their condition. Crane Inspection is performed as often as quarterly or/and semi-annual based on the service requirements.
Dexon has the capability to inspect all crane types including: Mobile, Gantry, Tower, Pedestal, Jib, Overhead Cranes and Hoists.

content2.title: The benefits of crane inspections are:

subtitle.text: Properly maintained cranes are essential for safe and productive operations, and are critical factors in reduced maintenance costs and extended equipment life.
Achieve Regulatory Compliance and Best Industry Practices
Reduce risk of accidents, injuries, and death
